# PlannerApp

Mobile version of Thumbtack Planner allows to view information about Thumbtack employees 

### Roadmap
Dates TBD
1. Login, view list of employees, view employee details
2. Search through employee list
3. Add local storage for offline mode 
4. Filter employee list by skills, department....

### Technologies
* App support iOS 13 only.
* Application is built using SwiftUI and Combine frameworks.
* Network layer generated by openapi-generator [openapi-generator](https://github.com/OpenAPITools/openapi-generator)
